titleInfo.title: Hank Snow's Grand Ole Opry Show at Bangor Auditorium

mods.abstract: Two color window card (red and blue on white) Hatch poster announcing Hank Snow and his Grand Ole Opry show featuring Wilma Lee and Stoney Cooper with Jimmie Snow, Cowboy Copas, Comedian Sleepy McDaniel and the Rainbow Ranch Boys at the Bangor Auditorium on November 13.

recordInfo.recordContentSource: Country Music Hall of Fame and Museum
recordInfo.recordOrigin: Record has been transformed into MODS v3.5 from a Qualified Dublin Core record by the Digital Library of Tennessee, a service hub of the Digital Public Library of America.
